medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil with slit neck opening; indigo ground cloth with supplementary weft patterning;  spectacular design of geometric motifs primarily in bright pink with aqua, green, blue, yellow and white accents; densely brocaded central design panel balanced above and below by simpler dot motif and stripes.
